about_the_game:
Welcome to ETea, the hottest boba store in town! In this blend of simulation and bobarista action, you play as Glorbo... an alien who crash-landed on Earth. After a misunderstanding gets them hired at ETea, Glorbo attempts to blend in as a human while navigating a solitary life far from home.

Key Features:

  • Experience Glorbo's heartwarming journey as they adapt to life on Earth, hidden in plain sight.

  • Master the art of making boba to satisfy the demands of your customers. Perfect your timing to keep them happy... and your cover intact!

  • Face off against challenging bosses that disrupt your routine! Use your skills and quick-thinking to serve these evil foes a defeat.

  • After a hard day's work, take Glorbo out to interact with locals and purchase a variety of items at numerous shops scattered throughout the city.

  • Customize the store and gradually upgrade Glorbo's capabilities as you progress through the narrative!

Help Glorbo blend in, make friends, and maybe even find a way back home. Can you keep their secret safe?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Video Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Help Glorbo master the art of making boba to satisfy customers and take down bosses in this unique blend of simulation and bobarista action!
